page.title: 19St.Luke's Church,Endon.
page.content: The parish of Endon with Stanley is in the diocese of Lichfield.Prior to 1730,when St.Luke's Church was founded, deceased people from Endon had to be taken to Leek for burial.Five years ago the parishioners of the village were able to celebrate the 250th anniversary of the church.To commemorate this event a Chapter House was built adjoining the church. It is used as a meeting place and as a venue for the Sunday School. Most of the delightful hassocks in the church have been hand stitched by ladies in local organisations. The church still contains four very large brass paraffin lamps and their shades, left in their original positions attached to brackets on the sides of the pillars. Today the church is lit by electricity.
